body_html:
@asimshankar
i build build_pip_package is ok
./configure with cuda
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --jobs 2 //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

but when run
bazel build --config=cuda --jobs 2 tensorflow/examples/label_image/label_image
come to:
_ERROR: /home/tanguofu/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tanguofu/5e46183ef599b405375ab0f36c679e7e/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool/BUILD:4:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/tanguofu/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tanguofu/5e46183ef599b405375ab0f36c679e7e/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool/BUILD", line 4
error_gpu_disabled()
File "/home/tanguofu/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tanguofu/5e46183ef599b405375ab0f36c679e7e/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool/error_gpu_disabled.bzl", line 3, in error_gpu_disabled
fail("ERROR: Building with --config=c...")
ERROR: Building with --config=cuda but TensorFlow is not configured to build with GPU support. Please re-run ./configure and enter 'Y' at the prompt to build with GPU support.
ERROR: no such target '@local_config_cuda//crosstool:toolchain': target 'toolchain' not declared in package 'crosstool' defined by /home/tanguofu/.cache/bazel/bazel_tanguofu/5e46183ef599b405375ab0f36

so which tf version do you build success ?
bazel build --config=cuda tensorflow/examples/label_image/..
and mine is master, the head git log is :

_tanguofu@tanguofu-ThinkPad-T450:~/workspace/tensorflow$ git log
commit 4e8497d
Merge: ef2ca7f ae36978
Author: drpngx drpngx@users.noreply.github.com
Date: Sun Oct 23 14:36:54 2016 -0700

Merge pull request #5135 from villasv/master

Option to config python lib path from env var_

thanks for your help.

body:
@asimshankar  
i build build_pip_package is ok  
`./configure with cuda`
`bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --jobs 2 //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

but when run 
`bazel build --config=cuda --jobs 2 tensorflow/examples/label_image/label_image`
come to:
_ERROR: /home/tanguofu/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tanguofu/5e46183ef599b405375ab0f36c679e7e/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool/BUILD:4:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/home/tanguofu/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tanguofu/5e46183ef599b405375ab0f36c679e7e/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool/BUILD", line 4
        error_gpu_disabled()
    File "/home/tanguofu/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tanguofu/5e46183ef599b405375ab0f36c679e7e/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool/error_gpu_disabled.bzl", line 3, in error_gpu_disabled
        fail("ERROR: Building with --config=c...")
ERROR: Building with --config=cuda but TensorFlow is not configured to build with GPU support. Please re-run ./configure and enter 'Y' at the prompt to build with GPU support.
ERROR: no such target '@local_config_cuda//crosstool:toolchain': target 'toolchain' not declared in package 'crosstool' defined by /home/tanguofu/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tanguofu/5e46183ef599b405375ab0f36_

so which tf version do you build success ?
`
bazel build --config=cuda tensorflow/examples/label_image/..
`
and mine is master, the head git log is : 

_tanguofu@tanguofu-ThinkPad-T450:~/workspace/tensorflow$ git log
commit 4e8497dcdb7918082732c01cf777f3559fc8168b
Merge: ef2ca7f ae36978
Author: drpngx drpngx@users.noreply.github.com
Date:   Sun Oct 23 14:36:54 2016 -0700

```
Merge pull request #5135 from villasv/master

Option to config python lib path from env var_
```

thanks for your help.
